alert.note: Alert for McLean; Tazewell (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 20 at 6:09PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Tazewell and west central McLean Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 608 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hopedale, or 16 miles southeast of Pekin, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Stanford around 620 PM CDT. Danvers around 625 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Bloomington, Carlock, Normal and Hudson. This includes the following highways... Interstate 155 between mile markers 15 and 19. Interstate 39 between mile markers 0 and 8. Interstate 55 between mile markers 154 and 168. Interstate 74 between mile markers 120 and 137. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central Illinois.
